txt.en: 'That Peg will try to cook anything. I swear I saw her eyeing my cat....'
'Captain Brackenbrook is a handsome devil, and no mistake! And I hear there's no Mrs. Brackenbrook....'
'Good old Kate Henseed! If not for her, the refugees would starve.'
'I've never seen wolves so close to town before...'
'That's the third supply wagon lost this month.  Between the wolves and the bandits, no road is safe!'
'I met that Amdir once. He didn't seem such a bad sort, no matter what some say.'
